MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G51 postcode area of Glasgow. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:50pm to repair electrical equipment on Paisley Road West and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:23pm on 15th November 2020.
